description: The Sense Ride 5 is equally in it’s element on short, fast trail runs as well as ultra distances. A super comfortable overachiever that easily adapts to a variety of terrains, with balanced midsole for cushioning, response and an engineered mesh upper with Sensifit for just the right amount of comfortable hold.
name: Salomon Sense Ride 5 - Mens

specs.value: Their All Terrain Contagrip® adapts to a multitude of surfaces. It offers great durability and boosts your confidence on wet, dry, hard or unstable terrain
Energy Foam - A lightweight, responsive foam made from a combination of EVA and Olefin [OBC] that provides long-lasting cushioning and dynamic energy return
Engineered Mesh- Thanks to its varied weave, the Engineered Mesh offers more support and resistance, or flexibility and breathability, depending on the needs of each part of the shoe
SensiFit™ wraps the foot from the midsole to the lacing system, providing a secure, precise and almost custom fit all around the foot
The Profeel Film increases the sensations of fluidity and stability by acting as a filter between the foot and the ground.
